title: Bridging the G.A.P.
creator_credit: Robert Rothols and Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: A promotional film showing the get-together in Victoria of gold awardees in the Duke of Edinburgh scheme. Depicts the community services carried out by the young people during their stay in Victoria.
